metadata.title: CVE-2022-49008 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:can: can327: can327_feed_frame_to_netdev(): fix potential skb leak whennetdev is downIn can327_feed_frame_to_netdev(), it did not free the skb when netdevis down, and all callers of can327_feed_frame_to_netdev() did not freeallocated skb too. That would trigger skb leak.Fix it by adding kfree_skb() in can327_feed_frame_to_netdev() when netdevis down. Not tested, just compiled.
